title: Nextflow pipeline parameters
description: Monoclonal plate based ONT antibody sequencing pipeline parameters

fastq_dir.help_text: Usually this is the path to the fastq_pass folder that contains a folder for each barcode, with arbitrarily many fastqs inside each barcode folder

out_dir.description: Directory to write the output to

sample_sheet.help_text: format of the sample sheet should be barcode,well,sample_name,notes; where notes are either 'Empty Well' or 'irrelevant phage'

vector_type.description: The type of vector, should match the flank file

igblast_databases.description: Location of IgBLAST databases for annotation

irrelevant_reference.description: FASTA reference for the irrelevant phage control

flanking_sequences.description: Path to the flanking sequence file for extraction of VH/VL

rotate_sequence.description: A sequence located in the plasmid that is used to rotate the reads (default: lac promoter)
